author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Football fan killed and dozens injured in crush outside Iraq stadium
description: Dozens more are reportedly hurt as football fans gather to watch Iraq play Oman in the city of Basra.
content:
At least one football fan has been killed and 60 others injured in a crush outside a stadium in the southern Iraqi city of Basra, local media report.
It happened as thousands of fans made their way â€¦ [+575 chars]
